title: Need to find L'UOMO VOGUE font!!!!
content:
Does anyone one know what font is used for ’L’UOMO’ on the L’UOMO VOGUE covers?

 [‹ Looks familiar and free](http://web.archive.org/web/20080711063554/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46374 "Go to previous forum topic") [Garamond..if not, what is it? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080711063554/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46369 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nza103

comments.content:
Futura bold with an altered Helvetica bold apostrophe

[http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=Futura+bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080711063554/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=Futura+bold)
